issue.title: [Format] Add additional language to Schema.fbs to clarify naive vs. localized Timestamp values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1020](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1020). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This line https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Schema.fbs#L116 has the potential to be misleading.

comments.body:
